import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./ToggleSwitch.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Dashboard(){const[bannerText,setBannerText]=useState("");const[timer,setTimer]=useState(0);const[bannerLink,setBannerLink]=useState("");const[bannerVisible,setBannerVisible]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/banner').then(response=>{const{text,link,timer,visible}=response.data;setBannerText(text);setBannerLink(link);setTimer(timer);setBannerVisible(visible);}).catch(error=>console.log(error));},[]);const handleSave=()=>{axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/banner',{text:bannerText,link:bannerLink,timer,visible:bannerVisible}).then(response=>{alert("Banner settings saved!");window.location.reload();// Reload the page to display changes immediately
}).catch(error=>console.log(error));};const toggleVisibility=()=>{setBannerVisible(!bannerVisible);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard p-4 bg-light rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Banner Text:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",value:bannerText,onChange:e=>setBannerText(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Banner Link:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",value:bannerLink,onChange:e=>setBannerLink(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Banner Timer (seconds):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control",value:timer,onChange:e=>setTimer(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Banner Visibility:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"switch",className:"checkbox",checked:bannerVisible,onChange:toggleVisibility}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"switch",className:"toggle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:" No \xA0\xA0  Yes"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleSave,children:"Save Settings"})]})]});}export default Dashboard;
